title: Can I start any startup just with my writing skills? - Quora

response.answer_text: Wikipedia says: “A startup company is an entrepreneurial venture which is typically a newly emerged, fast-growing business that aims to meet a marketplace need by developing a viable business model around an innovative product, service, process or a platform.” You need a good idea of a startup to start any startup. Does your idea fit the description above? Your writing skills will come in handy, when you have to plan and implement your business processes. On the other hand, if you want to offer writing services, you have to see what is it that you are offering that makes it worthy of being a startup? Can it be a regular business? Maybe you can freelance instead. Think about it!

Every startup begins with any idea behind it. If you have an idea, the you definitely can. With respect to writing skills and startups, I am not sure, but if you are good at writing, it is a great USP which you can use. Research on places where people with good writing skills are in demand, think of an idea, perhaps something which can involve not just you but others with similar talent and start some platform say a blog, etc. Put this up on linkedIn. You will have a lot of stuff to do.

Hi, Writing is a very good business in today's digital world. So many peoples are earning by writing. If you have that skill, you can contact with any web developer company, they need content writer on regular basis and for which they pay lucrative incentive too. Content writing is a very good profession, you can start it from your home. Otherwise you can start a blog, if you think you have skill on any specific topic or subject. Blogging is also a renowned profession in today’s digital life.

If you have excellent writing skills, there are plenty of options available. In fact, you are one of the few people, from whom a lot of other ventures can benefit from. You can start with: Content developmentGhost writing for peoplebecome an authorstart a magazine / newsletters publishing companyYou can further research this link for more ideas: 50 Business Ideas for Writing Entrepreneurs Just believe in your self.

Yes, actually it is really a great idea to start a startup with writing skills, for example You can start a blog about fashion or travel or job etiquette. You can start your own content marketing firm where you write content of product for firms. You can be a freelance writer for other startups You can be creative content developer for firms that use your content to market their products. All the best.
